main.name: Spencer Potts
main.bio: My name is Spencer Potts and I am a recent graduate from the Bootcamp at UCLA Extension. Based in Santa Clarita, CA, I am a hard-working, detail-oriented Software Developer passionate about learning, researching, and writing code and I relish the opportunity to take my programming skills and experience to a company where I can continue to learn and grow as a professional software developer.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me via email, this form, or LinkedIn

education.school: Full Stack Software Engineer Bootcamp at UCLA Extension - Los Angeles
education.description: Coursework Included: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Express.js, Handlebars, React.js, Node.js, Database Theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Git
